page.title: 11HOME LIFE A Day in the Life
page.content: At 9am Joanne and I met outside Superdrug for some shopping. We first went to Gateway for some eggs, then to John Vokins for some cotton and then bought some sweets. We walked home by 10 and watched television, and then a video. We went into the kitchen and made a Victoria sandwich cake with chocolate chips inside.We put it in the oven for 30 minutes at mark 4. For dinner we made ourselves cheese on toast and spaghetti, as Mum was out at work. In the afternoon we played Badminton in the garden, at 4pm we watched children's television. At 6 we had our tea, gammon steaks and fresh peaches with strawberries for afters. We then played upstairs on the computer. Joanne went for swimming training from 8.30 to 9.30. I went home and was asleep by 11pm.
